abstract.locale: An element rendered as a textbox and a button beside. A palette of colors from which a user may select by clicking on one of the grid cells.
Элемент отображается как textbox с расположенным рядом элементом button. При нажатии на кнопку, появляется элемент popup с палитрой цветов, доступных для выбора.

description.locale: Indicates whether the element is disabled or not.

Not implemented yet (use value)! The currently selected color. This is modified when the user selects a color. You can assign a string of the form #RRGGBB to this property to change the selected color.
The string attribute allows you to associate a data value with an element.
Fires when user selects a new date.
